title: [Self-directed] Mobile-Based English Vocabulary Gamification Learning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic English vocabulary and grammar comprehension
context.additional_context: Customized vocabulary learning support for professionals.

learning_goals: Learners can acquire 200 specialized English vocabulary terms (medical/legal/technical) with 80% accuracy within one week via a mobile app.
Learners can enhance learning engagement by 30% compared to traditional methods using gamification elements.
Learners can complete over 90% of personalized vocabulary exercises tailored to their progress through an adaptive learning system.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
